mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user (user_id,dept_id,login_name,password,user_name, user_type,email,phonenumber,sex,avatar, salt,create_by,create_time,remark) VALUES (UUID(),#{dept_id}, #{login_name}, #{password},#{user_name}, #{user_type}, #{email},#{phonenumber},#{sex},#{avatar},#{salt}, #{create_by},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(),#{remark})
